title: Phish - 2003-12-28 - American Airlines Arena [FLAC]
description:
12/28/2003	American Airlines Arena, Miami, FL

Set 1: David Bowie, Sample in a Jar, Tweezer > Bouncing Around the Room, AC/DC Bag > Frankie Says[1] > Llama, Hold Your Head Up > Love You[2] > Hold Your Head Up, Tweezer Reprise

Set 2: Gotta Jibboo, Suzy Greenberg[3] -> Jam > Theme From the Bottom, Water in the Sky, Friday > Harry Hood

Encore: Sleeping Monkey > Loving Cup

[1] Unfinished; extended jam segment.
[2] Altered lyrics due to Fishman forgetting the words.
[3] Extended jam segment after first chorus.

Teases:
Ã‚Â· The Lizards tease in Jam

Noteworthy Jams: Gotta Jibboo, Harry Hood, Suzy Greenberg (highly recommended), Theme From the Bottom, Llama, Jam (highly recommended), Frankie Says (highly recommended)

Notes: Frankie Says was unfinished and included an extended jam segment. Fishman forgot the words to Love You and scatted one verse, then sang, in near-perfect time: Ã¢â‚¬Å“I canÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t remember the words now / I canÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t remember the words / And it really doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t matter Ã¢â‚¬Ëœcause I canÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t sing either / So who gives a fuck, itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s time for the vacuum cleaner.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ During the closing HYHU, Fishman introduced the band, and himself as Ã¢â‚¬Å“Henrietta.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ Suzy included an extended jam segment after the first chorus. Trey seemed to end the song after the second chorus while the rest of the band continued to play. The jam after Suzy contained a Lizards tease from Trey.
